meanings.sent1: She stomped rebelliously out of the room.
meanings.sent2: The teenager glared rebelliously at her parents.
meanings.sent3: The cat meowed rebelliously when told to get off the couch.
meanings.sent4: The waves crashed rebelliously against the shore.
meanings.sent5: The storm clouds gathered rebelliously in the sky.

meanings.definition: Showing a desire to resist authority or control.
meanings.sent1: The rebellious child refused to follow the rules.
meanings.sent2: Her rebellious attitude often got her into trouble.
meanings.sent3: The rebellious puppy chewed up all the shoes.
meanings.sent4: The rebellious river overflowed its banks.
meanings.sent5: The rebellious student challenged the teacher's instructions.
